text: Hi! I'm trying to follow the tutorial about creating a theme and when I get to the part of adding the reference to the partial from the basic-page.html, I get this error from VS (please see screenshot). Is that expected? Or am I doing something wrong? Is there something wrong with my setup?.. I have the HubSpot cli running, i can upload my files properly to my sandbox account, etc. It's just this path thing..
Looks like incorrect filepath, maybe? Your partials file appears to be inside templates, but you’re only look in partial. you need to add the templates folder to the path.  I think…
